mcq.statement: Choose the sentence that is grammatically correct from the options provided. The new policy has been implemented, nor has it been communicated to the staff.

options.a: The new policy has been implemented, nor has it been communicated to the staff.
options.b: The new policy has been implemented, but it has not been communicated to the staff.
options.c: The new policy has been implemented, yet it has not been communicated to the staff.
options.d: The new policy has been implemented, so it has not been communicated to the staff.
